body.name: SSK 1TB USB SSD Solid State Flash Drive 550MB/s Super-Fast Transfer Speed USB 3.2 Gen2 Thumb(Jump) Drive Memory Stick + USB C Adapter for Type-c Smartphone, Laptop, MacBook/Pro/Air and More
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 13. Order within 2 hrs 23 mins
Or fastest pickup Thursday, February 15. Order within 18 hrs 23 mins
features: New Ultra-High-Speed Transmission: SSK USB 3.2 flash drive provides up to 550MB/s read speed and 520MB/s write speed which is 10 times faster than conventional USB 3.0 memory stick. And more importantly, the speed does not drop during the transmission and the condition of capacity use. It is suitable for daily movement of large-capacity files and photos. According to internal testing, performance may vary slightly due to factors such as host equipment, interfaces, and usage conditions

Advanced Design: The exquisite and compact SSK solid state external thumb drive is made of high-grade zinc alloy material, which is resistant to falling and abrasion. The cover firmly holds the USB metal port, and flip-up cap design effectively protects the USB interface

Safe & Reliable: Store your photos, videos, music and files quickly and safely. SSK usb external ssd drive have excellent shock resistance and fast heat dissipation performance, Waterproof and dustproof functions better protect your data

Excellent Compatibility: Super fast speed flash memory stick plug and play. Come with type c adapter, this ssd external hard drive is not only applicable to conventional USB A port computer equipment, smart TV, car audio, but also suitable for USB C smartphones, Laptops and macbook; Backward-compatible with USB 3.0 and USB 2.0 ports

Quality Assurance: Mini size usb storage, 1TB large capacity, you can take this usb ssd external flash drive with you wherever you go. Advanced business portable jump drive, record your life and work at any time. The 3-year long warranty time allows you to buy and use without worries.
body.description: High-Grade All-Metal Frosted USB3.2 Super Fast-Speed Transmission Interface Mini portable usb memory stick The perfect storage solution for anyone on the go.（The size is only 2.9*0.75inches） Excellent storage capacity to backup and share your valuable files, photos, videos, etc. Technology allows you to enjoy better freedom Tips: The Computer and USB Flash Drive have Different Capacity Calculation Algorithms. The Computer 1G=1024M, USB Flash Drive 1G=1000M, so the USB Flash Drive's Capacity Displayed on the Computer is about 90% of the Actual Identification. Protective cover Near universal compatibility Excellent protection performance Available Capacity:128GB,256GB,512GB,1TB for your choice

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Stable Reading/Writing Speed During the transmission and the use of capacity, SSK solid state flash drives still maintain high-speed transmission.It will not dropp off sharply halfway through the read process even when it reaches its full storage capacity. Tips: The Writing Speed remains stable when the file size of each transfer is less than 1/3 of the remaining usuable capacity. For example, when the USB SSD has 600GB remaining usuable capacity, you can transfer data less than 200GB at a time, the speed will not drop.

USB3.2 Super Fast Transmission Speed Flash Drive Adopt the latest USB 3.2 Gen 2 standard, experience up to 550 MB/s read speed and 520 MB/s write speed, send 2GB 4K UHD video files from the storage stick to your PC in just 5 seconds , Let you work and play more efficiently. (Please Note: If connect to a USB3.0 or USB3.1 Gen1 port, the transfer speed will be limited up to 450MB/s.)Work as fast as you need to with premium performance and huge capacities in a reliable USB flash drive. Blazing-fast performance lets you transfer a full-length 4K movie to the drive in less than 10 seconds or 1000 photos in less than 20 seconds.

SSK products are constructed to the highest standards and rigorously tested. You can be confident in the outstanding quality, performance and reliability of every SSK products. The Computer 1G=1024M, USB Flash Drive 1G=1000M, so the USB Flash Drive's Capacity Displayed on the Computer is about 90% of the Actual Identification. SSD High Performance Chip Using SSD solid-state memory chips, with high quality and strong stability. The speed does not drop when write data at once within 1/3 of remaining capacity can be used. Metal Shell Adopt intergrated package technology, metal-made casing, features fast heat dissipation,works very well for transferring large files. With waterproof, dustproof, and shockproof function, data is safer. Works with Multiple Devices Come with type C adapter, it works with MacBook (2016)/ MacBook Pro 13.3''/ MacBook Pro 15.4'' / Macbook Air ect. It is compatible with Pad Pro, please find it under " File folder". Lightning Backup This 128/256/512gb USB flash drive with type C adapter is plug-and-play, and files/photos/videos can be backed up several times with one-click. The ultra-fast reading speed saves you more time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great performance, solid build
reviews.reviewText: One terabyte in a thumb drive -- wow! I can say this thing screams "premium" -- the metal casing and solidness of it feel like it could be an Apple productIt copies faster than my old SATA HDDs can put files on it. My NVME drives max out the USB bandwidth and copy at several hundred megabytes per second. Moving entire seasons of backed up discs is a breeze. Can easily load tons of material for a road trip or to go over to a friend's houseI've used some flash drives that were large, but awful. I had a TeamGroup USB that copied only slightly faster than a floppy disk despite having 256GB storage. This is the complete opposite and for the price you are getting a wonderful product. It is durable, it runs cool, and it is -FAST-. Don't waste your money on one of the cheaper drives that will take a year to copy files -- this is what you want

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This thing is spectacular.
reviews.reviewText: I got this not sure how fast it would be, because the last flashdrive I got was unreliable and overheated. This one definitely gets warm after use, but it is so blazing fast. I have been using it for months now and have transferred so many files. I am extremely happy with it. The solid metal feel is sturdy and resistant while also protecting your fingers from the heat when you reach for it.It managed to make it through a hectic move across the country and I love the USB-C that comes with it. My Dad only has USB-C ports so it's perfect when he asks me for my videos. It transfers Gigabytes of data in seconds! Don't go for the ultra cheap ones, they don't store as much as advertised, are unreliable, and slow. My Dad lost Gigabytes of data because of this. Get this so you don't waste your time, and start enjoying blazing fast and reliable file transfers!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This drive even feels nice in your hand!
reviews.reviewText: This is a very nice thumb drive. The size capacity and that it is SSD technology is why I bought it, but Iove that it has some weight to it. It's in a nice metal enclosure instead of the standard plastic you get with almost all others. I use this drive only fory Blender 3D projects, and it does read and write fast!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Performs to its speed capability most of the time, but could be better mechanically
reviews.reviewText: I have purchased multiple high capacity jump drives recently looking for one that has large storage capacity, works for PC / Mac, and does not die or have issues when the data stored reaches some modest percentage of the total available space, and does not have mechanical issues. This solid state drive meets most of those requirements.......but only has a USB-A connector, so they provide an adapter for USB-c. Seems reasonable enough, I have lots of adapters to pick from already, but they send one with the product so I thought it would be a good fit. Not so, both the USB-A and USB-c sides of the adapter are not good mechanical matches so the drive droops when plugged in via USB-A or USB-c. Can't just let the drive hang out of the socket, so some care is required is using it. It does get hot, as some other reviewers have said, but as long as the case gets hot, hopefully the devices inside are not being stressed. A few weeks of use should tell us if there is an issue there. Four stars because of the mechanical issues, but otherwise it seems to be a reasonable product, which it should be for the premium price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and fast!
reviews.reviewText: I was surprised by how hefty this drive is. It's very sturdy metal. But then I was blown away when I decided to install macOS Sonoma on it and BOOT from it. Then I ran an MMORPG game I'm currently developing. Everything was as fast or even faster than running from my built-in SSD. Some of this could be because my older Mac installation has too much running. But still. This is just a FLASH drive!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked fine, very very fast transfers
reviews.reviewText: I got this to transfer data from an old computer that needs more space freed up. It transferred photo files faster than any other drive that I have used. The document files transferred a little bit slower, but still went as fast as I could ask for. I am very pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: 2023-09-23 UPDATE:Do not buy this drive because it falls apart. See the attached photo.This happened to me soon after I bought my first drive, but at that time, SSK answered my email and sent me a free replacement.The exact same defect happened with the replacement several month later. When I emailed SSK recently, they refused to reply.The company clearly has deep quality problems. This is a shame, because the drive has potential.Also, the #1 feature that I used to like about this drive was that it had sustained good transfer speeds (see original review below). But lately I have noticed that its transfer speed seems to oscillate. (Well, it could be caused by the source SATA SSD that I am copying files from that is the culprit, but I think that it is more like the SSK thumb drive that I am copying to.)--------------------------------------------------ORIGINAL review:I am hungry for a high performance flash drive. I want an SSD on a small stick.The number 1 defect in every flash drive that I have owned up till now is that you get their rated speeds for maybe10-30 seconds, and then, due to crap thermal designs, the controller detects over heating and throttles the speed down by 3-5X. Disaster when you want to do serious file transfers.This drive, however, is the first that I have ever owned which seems to maintain its speed over long time periods. Writing a 20 GB file to it sees no diminishment in speed over the minute or so that that takes.I also love how the width and depth of this drive are minimal.My main complaint about this drive is that I do not like its flip cap. I would prefer a traditional cap. SSK: just make sure that you can put the cap on the non port end when you have the drive inserted, so that you do not lose the cap.SSK: you also need to revise this product to have a USBC-C version that gets the speeds of the Kingston DataTraveler Max. I would have bought the Kingston, but a) it is way too wide (causes port crowding) and b) it thermally throttles.

Funciona muy bien, irreal que en ese tamaño le quepan los 2TB y la capacidad es real, ya le metí 1.4 terabites y sin problema, es rápido, solo que depende que tu computadora tenga los puertos nuevos y más rápidos para que funcione al 100%, en mi caso transfirió bastante bien 300 gigas a una tasa de 150mb/s pero mi compu ya es vieja, después de los 300 gigas si mermó mucho la velocidad por que se calienta bastante, pero funciona muy bien. Es muy robusto, se siente pesado pero no es grande. Excelente precio lo compré en $2100 pesos, y está excelente. Trae su adaptador a usb tipo c incluido.

reviews.reviewTitle: SSK Is the way to go I'm telling you!!
reviews.reviewText: Ultra Fast!!! great quality, you get what you pay for! I'm really happy with them since I bought 2 for DJing.Very solid product I would recommend 100%
During use it warms up, which is expected. But the glue holding it together will stop holding. Anyway, this happened after 2 months of use. Be careful using it when it's warm
Seems to be slower than advertised but meets my needs perfectly.
Hasta el momento ha funcionado bien, la velocidad de transferencia ha sido mayor que con cualquier otra memoria pasando un archivo de 15gb en menos de cuatro minutos
